param.name: gallery_folders
param.label: Albums
param.description: Enable or disable display of albums.

param.name: gallery_folders_width
param.label: Box Width
param.description: Input the item box width in pixels. Leave blank for same as global (default: 200). Note you can have a minimum box width of 100.

param.name: gallery_folders_create
param.label: Create
param.description: Enable or disable creation of albums.

param.name: gallery_folders_create_access
param.label: Access
param.description: Select album create access. Access determines who can create albums. Moderators are exempt from this configuration.

param.name: gallery_folders_create_limit
param.label: Limit
param.description: Select the field to use for album create limit. Moderators are exempt from this configuration.

param.name: gallery_folders_create_limit_custom
param.label: Custom Limit
param.description: Input number of albums each individual user is limited to creating. Leave blank for same as global (default: unlimited).

param.name: gallery_folders_create_approval
param.label: Approval
param.description: Enable or disable approval of albums. Approval requires a moderator to publish a album before it is made visible. Moderators are exempt from this configuration.

param.name: gallery_folders_create_approval_notify
param.label: Notify
param.description: Enable or disable moderator notifications for albums needing approval.

param.name: gallery_folders_create_captcha
param.label: Captcha
param.description: Enable or disable usage of captcha on albums. Requires latest CB AntiSpam to be installed and published. Moderators are exempt from this configuration.

param.name: gallery_folders_paging
param.label: Paging
param.description: Enable or disable usage of paging.

param.name: gallery_folders_paging_limit
param.label: Limit
param.description: Input page limit. Page limit determines how many albums are displayed per page. If paging is disabled this can still be used to limit the number of albums displayed. Leave blank for same as global (default: 15).

param.name: gallery_folders_search
param.label: Search
param.description: Enable or disable usage of search on albums.

param.name: gallery_folders_orderby
param.label: Order By
param.description: Select how to order the albums.

param.name: gallery_folders_items_paging
param.label: Paging
param.description: Enable or disable usage of paging.

param.name: gallery_folders_items_paging_limit
param.label: Limit
param.description: Input page limit. Page limit determines how many media are displayed per page. If paging is disabled this can still be used to limit the number of media displayed. Leave blank for same as global (default: 15).

param.name: gallery_folders_items_search
param.label: Search
param.description: Enable or disable usage of search on media.

param.name: gallery_folders_items_orderby
param.label: Order By
param.description: Select how to order the media.

param.name: gallery_items_width
param.label: Box Width
param.description: Input the media box width in pixels. Leave blank for same as global (default: 200). Note you can have a minimum box width of 100.

param.name: gallery_items_create
param.label: Create
param.description: Enable or disable creation of media.

param.name: gallery_items_create_captcha
param.label: Captcha
param.description: Enable or disable usage of captcha on media. Requires latest CB AntiSpam to be installed and published. Moderators are exempt from this configuration. Note has no affect on multi-upload pages.

param.name: gallery_items_create_approval_notify
param.label: Notify
param.description: Enable or disable moderator notifications for media needing approval.

param.name: gallery_items_paging
param.label: Paging
param.description: Enable or disable usage of paging.

param.name: gallery_items_paging_limit
param.label: Limit
param.description: Input page limit. Page limit determines how many media are displayed per page. If paging is disabled this can still be used to limit the number of media displayed. Leave blank for same as global (default: 15).

param.name: gallery_items_search
param.label: Search
param.description: Enable or disable usage of search on media.

param.name: gallery_items_orderby
param.label: Order By
param.description: Select how to order the media.

param.name: gallery_photos
param.label: Photos
param.description: Enable or disable display of photos.

param.name: gallery_photos_download
param.label: Download
param.description: Enable or disable downloading of photos.

param.name: gallery_photos_avatar
param.label: Make Avatar
param.description: Enable or disable setting a photo to profile avatar. Note this is only available if the viewing user is also the owner of the photo. This will also bypass avatar upload approval and edit access checks.

param.name: gallery_photos_canvas
param.label: Make Canvas
param.description: Enable or disable setting a photo to profile canvas. Note this is only available if the viewing user is also the owner of the photo. This will also bypass canvas upload approval and edit access checks.

param.name: gallery_photos_create
param.label: Create
param.description: Enable or disable creation of photos.

param.name: gallery_photos_create_access
param.label: Access
param.description: Select photo create access. Access determines who can create photos. Moderators are exempt from this configuration.

param.name: gallery_photos_create_limit
param.label: Limit
param.description: Select the field to use for photo create limit. Moderators are exempt from this configuration.

param.name: gallery_photos_create_limit_custom
param.label: Custom Limit
param.description: Input number of photos each individual user is limited to creating. Leave blank for same as global (default: unlimited).

param.name: gallery_photos_upload
param.label: Upload
param.description: Enable or disable uploading of photos.

param.name: gallery_photos_link
param.label: Link
param.description: Enable or disable linking of photos. Linking allows photos to be displayed in the gallery from external sources.

param.name: gallery_photos_create_approval
param.label: Approval
param.description: Enable or disable approval of photos. Approval requires a moderator to publish a photo before it is made visible. Moderators are exempt from this configuration.

param.name: gallery_photos_metadata
param.label: Metadata
param.description: Enable or disable collection and display of upload metadata. This includes EXIF and IFD data. Note this will not work with client resized images.

param.name: gallery_photos_resample
param.label: Always Resample
param.description: Choose if images uploaded should always be resampled. Resampling adds additional security, but animations will only be kept when using ImageMagick.

param.name: gallery_photos_image_height
param.label: Maximum Image Height
param.description: Input the maximum height in pixels that the image will be resized to. Leave blank for same as global (default: 640).

param.name: gallery_photos_image_width
param.label: Maximum Image Width
param.description: Input the maximum width in pixels that the image will be resized to. Leave blank for same as global (default: 1280).

param.name: gallery_photos_thumbnail_height
param.label: Maximum Thumbnail Height
param.description: Input the maximum thumbnail height in pixels that the image will be resized to. Leave blank for same as global (default: 320).

param.name: gallery_photos_thumbnail_width
param.label: Maximum Thumbnail Width
param.description: Input the maximum thumbnail width in pixels that the image will be resized to. Leave blank for same as global (default: 640).

param.name: gallery_photos_maintain_aspect_ratio
param.label: Maintain Aspect Ratio
param.description: Choose if images uploaded should maintain their aspect ratio when resizing. If set to No the image will always be resized to the specified maximum width and height. If set to Yes the aspect ratio will be maintained as much as possible within the maximum width and height. If set to Yes with Cropping the image will always resize to the specified maximum width and height within the aspect ratio and crop any overflow; this is useful for maintain squared images.

param.name: gallery_photos_min_size
param.label: Minimum File Size
param.description: Input the minimum item file size in KBs. Leave blank for same as global (default: 0).

param.name: gallery_photos_max_size
param.label: Maximum File Size
param.description: Input the maximum item file size in KBs. Set to 0 for no limit. Leave blank for same as global (default: 1024).

param.name: gallery_photos_client_resize
param.label: Allow Client Resize
param.description: Enable or disable client side resizing of images. This will attempt to use HTML5 canvas to resize the image before upload.
